definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_pre_hurt</field><next><block type="entity_nbt_num_set"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Max Health minus Current Health = HP indicator</comment><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">HpIndicator</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health_max"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat" inline="false"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Damage Dealt: </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">HpIndicator</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="world_entity_inrange"><field name="entity">EntityPlayer</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
